ca.eandb.jmist.framework

Interface Function1

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsorptionFunction1, AXpBFunction1, BlackbodySpectrum, CIEIlluminantASpectrum, CIEIlluminantDSpectrum, ComposedFunction1, CompositeFunction1, ConstantFunction1, PiecewiseLinearFunction1, ProductFunction1, ScaledFunction1, SellmeierFunction1, SumFunction1, UniformPiecewiseConstantFunction1, UniformPiecewiseLinearFunction1

    public interface Function1
extends Serializable
    Represents a unary function.
    Author:
    Brad Kimmel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Function1 IDENTITY
      The identity Function1.
      static Function1 NEGATIVE_INFINITY
      A Function1 whose value is NEGATIVE_INFINITY at all wavelengths.
      static Function1 ONE
      A Function1 that evaluates to one everywhere.
      static Function1 POSITIVE_INFINITY
      A Function1 whose value is POSITIVE_INFINITY everywhere.
      static Function1 ZERO
      A Function1 that evaluates to zero everywhere.

        Evaluates the function at the specified point in its domain.
        Parameters:
